00027 #include <errno.h>
00028 #include <string.h>
00029 #include <pthread.h>
00030 
00031 #include <libfreedom/liblog.h>
00032 #include <libfreedom/layers.h>
00033 
00034 #include "llp_info.h"
00035 #include "llp.h"
00036 
00037 /*============================================================================*/
00038 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */
00039 /*============================================================================*/
00040 
00044 typedef struct {
00045         int active_sessions_counter;    
00046 } llp_info_t;
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Object that stores the information associated with the link layer.
00050  */
00051 static llp_info_t info;
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Lock used to access the llp info object.
00055  */
00056 static pthread_mutex_t info_mutex;
00057 
00058 /*============================================================================*/
00059 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00060 /*============================================================================*/
00061 
00062 int llp_info_initialize() {
00063 
00064         if (pthread_mutex_init(&info_mutex, NULL) > 0) {
00065                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error allocating mutex: %s.",
00066                                 strerror(errno));
00067                 return LLP_ERROR;
00068         }
00069         
00070         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "mutex initialized.");
00071         
00072         info.active_sessions_counter = 0;
00073         
00074         return LLP_OK;
00075 }
00076 /******************************************************************************/
00077 void llp_info_finalize() {
00078 
00079         pthread_mutex_destroy(&info_mutex);
00080         
00081         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "mutex destroyed.");
00082 }
00083 /******************************************************************************/
00084 int llp_get_active_sessions_counter() {
00085         int return_value;
00086         
00087         pthread_mutex_lock(&info_mutex);
00088         return_value = info.active_sessions_counter;
00089         pthread_mutex_unlock(&info_mutex);
00090         
00091         return return_value;
00092 }
00093 /******************************************************************************/
00094 void llp_add_active_sessions_counter(int increment) {
00095         pthread_mutex_lock(&info_mutex);
00096         info.active_sessions_counter += increment;
00097         pthread_mutex_unlock(&info_mutex);
00098 }
00099 /******************************************************************************/
